All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Administrator
Administrator class that extends the User class
AdministratorBoundary
AdministratorBoundary class represents the user interface for an administrator in the HMS system.
AdministratorController
The AdministratorController class that provides methods to access and retrieve staff-related information from the UserRepository.
Appointment
Appointment class extends Records
AppointmentController
The AppointmentController class provides methods to handle appointment records, such as retrieving, filtering, and modifying appointments for doctors and patients.
AppointmentOutcomeRecord
Represents the appointment outcome record of a patient's appointment.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordRepository
Repository class for managing AppointmentOutcomeRecord data, including loading and saving data to a CSV file.
AppointmentOutcomeStatus
Represents the status of an appointment outcome in the system.
AppointmentStatus
Represents the various statuses an appointment can have in the system.
Authenticable
Interface to represent entities that can be authenticated with a username and password.
AvailabilitySetterBoundary
AvailabilitySetter Boundary class represents the user interface for a doctor setting their availability.
Boundary
Base Boundary Class where all the boundary classes inherit from
Contactable
Interface to represent contactable entities with email and phone details.
DateTime
Utility class to facilitate user selection of a date and time.
Diagnosis
Represents a Diagnosis made for a patient, which includes details such as the diagnosis description, treatment plans, prescriptions, and relevant IDs for patient, doctor, and medical records.
DiagnosisRepository
Repository class for managing Diagnosis data, including loading and saving data to a CSV file.
Doctor
Doctor class that extends the User class
DoctorBoundary
DoctorBoundary class represents the user interface for a doctor in the HMS system This class handles doctor-specific interactions
DoctorController
The DoctorController class provides methods for retrieving doctor-related information from the UserRepository.
Identification
Interface to represent identifiable entities with a unique ID.
LoginBoundary
This is the login interface for handling login functionality in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
Main
Main entry point for our Hospital Management System application.
MainBoundary
The Main User Interface Menu
MedicalRecord
Represents a medical record for a patient, containing personal information, blood type, allergies, and a list of diagnoses.
Medicine
Represents a medicine in the system.
MedicineController
The MedicineController class that provides methods to access and retrieve information regarding medicine from the MedicineRepository.
MedicineRepository
Repository class for managing Medicine data, including loading and saving data to a CSV file.
MonitorInventoryBoundary
MonitorInventoryBoundary manages the user interface for monitoring and managing inventory levels of medicines, including checking for expired and low-stock items.
MRBoundary
A user interface class for displaying a patient's medical record in a formatted view.
Patient
Patient class that extends the User class
PatientBoundary
PatientBoundary class represents the user interface for a patient in the HMS system This class handles patient-specific interactions
PatientController
The PatientController class that provides methods to access and retrieve patient-related information from the UserRepository.
PaymentRecord
Represents a payment record in the system.
PaymentRecordBoundary
A user interface class for displaying a patient's medical record in a formatted view.
PaymentStatus
Represents the status of a payment.
PersonalDetails
Interface to represent entities with personal details such as name, date of birth, and gender.
Pharmacist
Pharmacist class that extends the User class
PharmacistBoundary
PharmacistBoundary class represents the user interface for a pharmacist in the HMS system This class handles pharmacist-specific interactions
PharmacistController
The PharmacistController class that provides methods to access and retrieve pharmacist-related information from the AppointmentOutcomeRecord and PrescribedMedication Repositories.
PrescribedMedication
Prescribed Medication class for a patient, including information about the diagnosis, medicine, dosage, and treatment duration.
PrescribedMedicationRepository
Prescribed Medication Repository reads, loads,stores and updates data for all csv files for prescribed medication
PrescribedMedicineController
The PrescribedMedicineController class that provides methods to access and retrieve information regarding prescribed medications from the PrescribedMedicationRepository.
Prescription
Represents a prescription for a patient, including the diagnosis ID, prescription date, and the medications prescribed as part of the treatment.
PrescriptionRepository
Prescription Repository reads, loads,stores and updates data for all csv files for prescription
PrescriptionStatus
Represents the status of a prescription in the system.
Record
Enum representing different types of record files within the system.
RecordOutcomeBoundary
Represents the Boundary for recording appointment outcome
Records
Abstract class representing a generic record in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
RecordsController
This Records Controller class is responsible for managing and handling various records (Medical, Appointment, Payment) in the system.
RecordsRepository
RecordsRepository class for managing all records in the system such as payment records, medical records, appointment records.
RecordStatus
Represents the different statuses a record can have in the system.
RegisterBoundary
User Registration handling Menu
RegisterController
This Register Controller class is responsible for registering, handling methods between repository and the Boundary classes
ReplenishRequestBoundary
ReplenishRequestBoundary manages the user interface for submitting replenishment requests for low-stock medicines and checking current replenishment request statuses.
ReplenishStatus
Represents the status of a medication replenishment request.
Repository
Abstract Repository class where all repositories inherit from
ReschedulerBoundary
The ReschedulerBoundary class provides functionality to reschedule appointments for a patient.
RoleAssignable
Interface to represent entities with an assignable role.
SchedulerBoundary
The SchedulerBoundary class provides an interface for patients to schedule appointments with doctors, offering functionality to input availability and display scheduled appointments.
Treatment
Represents a Treatment Plan associated with a particular diagnosis.
TreatmentRepository
Repository class for managing Treatment data, including loading and saving data to a CSV file.
UpdateDetailsBoundary
This class provides a user interface to view and update the particulars of a Patient.
UpdateMRBoundary
This class provides a UI to update the medical records of a patient during a doctor's appointment.
UpdatePrescriptionBoundary
UpdatePrescriptionBoundary handles the user interface for updating the status of a specific prescription in an appointment outcome record.
User
Enum representing different types of personnel files, each associated with a specific file name for personnel data (e.g., doctors, patients, pharmacists, admins).
User
User Super class in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
UserController
The UserController class is a super class that provides methods to access and retrieve user-related information from the UserRepository.
UserRepository
Repository class for managing personnel data, including Doctors, Patients, Pharmacists, and Admins.
UserSessionTracker
UserSessionTracker Class Tracks the User currently in the system Contains the user ID, role, and the start time of the session.
Validator
This Validator class provides various helper methods for input reading, validation, formatting, and general utilities for console applications.
ViewAppointmentOutcomeBoundary
The ViewAppointmentOutcomeBoundary class provides a user interface for viewing appointment outcome records for patients within the Hospital Management System.
